short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All of your favorite news delivered to you all in one place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extra! Extra! Read all about it!

Stay informed with Paperboy, your all-in-one Chrome extension for real-time news updates and trending stories. Quickly access top headlines and explore what's making waves worldwide, all without leaving your browser.

Key Features:

- Top Headlines: Browse breaking news across multiple categories like world news, technology, entertainment, sports, and more.
- Trending News Stories: Discover the hottest stories trending locally and globally.
- Customizable Feed: Personalize your news experience by selecting topics and sources you care about.

Stay updated, stay ahead. Let Paperboy deliver all your news to you and make your browsing smarter!

This extension updates your browser New Tab and provides:
- Web Search powered by Yahoo

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Paperboy Newtab and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Yahoo as described by the service in the Terms of Use (https://paperboynews.app/terms-of-service/) and Policy (https://paperboynews.app/privacy-policy/).
